name: 简体 手機版beta明高溫泉會館

stay_info:

														簡介：

														　　明高溫泉位於台中中部橫貫公路、海拔八百公尺、大甲溪沿岸的谷關溫泉風景區內。自西元1907年發現溫泉後，即成為日治時代最早期所開發的溫泉療養所。
全館均提供谷關無色無味之優質碳酸原湯，並取用八仙山之山冷泉供蒞臨貴賓沐浴及飲水使用。
會館位於谷關最佳之地理位置，幾步之遙就可以到達豐原客運谷關總站、谷關溫泉文化館、梢來步道及八仙山森林遊樂區。
館內配備停車場供貴賓停泊您的愛車。
全體員工竭誠歡迎您來體驗谷關最物超所值的溫泉享宴。
 
Mingao Spring Hotel is located at GuGuan ,the famous hotspring spot in the central Taiwan.
In 1907,Hot Spring was discovered here,beside the DaijiaRiver.
The hotel is located in the center of GuGuan , only a few steps away to get to the Fengyuan Bus Station, HotSpringCulturalCenter, Shaolai Trail and BaxianshanNational Forest Recreation Area. 
Our luxurious Spring suit was designed of the whole new environment friendly concept and each suit has its exclusive large-scale bathtub or jacuzzi for guests to choose . Guests of the standard room may also free use the entire new atmosphere Spring bathtub at any time of your stay.
Parking lot is prepared for your vehicle. 
Our elegant and tasteful decoration; and our discreet but devoted service will provide you a feeling of being at home.
													
													
													
														 住房規定：
														
													
													
														
														
															休息時間：平日3小時，假日2小時
平日進房時間：PM 03:00，退房時間：AM 11:00假日進房時間：PM 05:00，退房時間：AM 11:00住宿區分：平日週日至週五
假日週六至週六全館提供谷關無色無味的碳酸泉並搭配中部水質最好的高山涼泉，邀您體驗谷關明高溫泉的迷人之處。

														　　明高溫泉位於台中中部橫貫公路、海拔八百公尺、大甲溪沿岸的谷關溫泉風景區內。自西元1907年發現溫泉後，即成為日治時代最早期所開發的溫泉療養所。
全館均提供谷關無色無味之優質碳酸原湯，並取用八仙山之山冷泉供蒞臨貴賓沐浴及飲水使用。
會館位於谷關最佳之地理位置，幾步之遙就可以到達豐原客運谷關總站、谷關溫泉文化館、梢來步道及八仙山森林遊樂區。
館內配備停車場供貴賓停泊您的愛車。
全體員工竭誠歡迎您來體驗谷關最物超所值的溫泉享宴。
 
Mingao Spring Hotel is located at GuGuan ,the famous hotspring spot in the central Taiwan.
In 1907,Hot Spring was discovered here,beside the DaijiaRiver.
The hotel is located in the center of GuGuan , only a few steps away to get to the Fengyuan Bus Station, HotSpringCulturalCenter, Shaolai Trail and BaxianshanNational Forest Recreation Area. 
Our luxurious Spring suit was designed of the whole new environment friendly concept and each suit has its exclusive large-scale bathtub or jacuzzi for guests to choose . Guests of the standard room may also free use the entire new atmosphere Spring bathtub at any time of your stay.
Parking lot is prepared for your vehicle. 
Our elegant and tasteful decoration; and our discreet but devoted service will provide you a feeling of being at home.

明高溫泉位於台中中部橫貫公路、海拔八百公尺、大甲溪沿岸的谷關溫泉風景區內。自西元1907年發現溫泉後，即成為日治時代最早期所開發的溫泉療養所。
全館均提供谷關無色無味之優質碳酸原湯，並取用八仙山之山冷泉供蒞臨貴賓沐浴及飲水使用。
會館位於谷關最佳之地理位置，幾步之遙就可以到達豐原客運谷關總站、谷關溫泉文化館、梢來步道及八仙山森林遊樂區。
館內配備停車場供貴賓停泊您的愛車。
全體員工竭誠歡迎您來體驗谷關最物超所值的溫泉享宴。

The hotel is located in the center of GuGuan , only a few steps away to get to the Fengyuan Bus Station, HotSpringCulturalCenter, Shaolai Trail and BaxianshanNational Forest Recreation Area. 
Our luxurious Spring suit was designed of the whole new environment friendly concept and each suit has its exclusive large-scale bathtub or jacuzzi for guests to choose . Guests of the standard room may also free use the entire new atmosphere Spring bathtub at any time of your stay.
Parking lot is prepared for your vehicle.
